text: Topoľčany () is a town in the Nitra Region in Slovakia. About 25,000 people live there. The Nitra River flows through a valley between the two mountain ranges: Tribeč to the southeast and Považský Inovec to the northwest. It is the birthplace of the current Prime Minister of Slovakia Robert Fico. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Nitra Region
title: Topoľčany
